      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Generates a new instance of GroupLayoutHelper with a list of lists, each one representing a column.

      Links the horizontal sizes of the given components.

      Links the vertical sizes of the given components.

      Sets the inner margins of the layout.
      GroupLayoutHelper GroupLayoutHelper.setIsInnerPanel(boolean innerPanel)
      Use this method to remove inner margins from this panel, so it can be used as a nested panel without adding extra indent levels.
